name: REVENGE CITY
description:
A gta-clone in 64px made for the lowrezjam2021,but you're a cop !

This project is my submission for the LOWREZJAM2021, the view in game must be 64x64 pixels that's the biggest constaint.

    I added a lot of thing and tested if that's possible to made a gta in that lower resolution, i have a lot of inspiration like *retro city rampage* or the first *gta*.

...
